subject: AI & Agents
title: TF-IDF for Text-Based Recommendations
description: A 60-second lesson on TF-IDF for Text-Based Recommendations.

hook.text: Which words make a movie description unique? 'The' appears everywhereâ€”ignore it. 'Heist' is rareâ€”keep it.

buildup.text: TF-IDF scores words by how often they appear in a document vs how rare they are overall.

discovery.text: Rare, topic-specific words get high scores. Common words get near-zero. Perfect for matching.

twist.text: TF-IDF vectors are sparse and high-dimensional. Cosine similarity compares them efficiently.

climax.text: TF-IDF powered early search and recommendation engines. Simple, interpretable, and fast.

punchline.text: The rarer the word, the more it tells you.

quiz.question: What does TF-IDF measure?
options: How important a word is to a document relative to a collection
